data.name: Radial-G: Proteus
data.description:
Radial-G: Proteus is a futuristic arcade racer for the VR generation! Climb into the cockpit of a gravity-defying race craft and tear up the tubular tracks as battle commences. Radial-G delivers full immersion racing featuring gut-wrenching twists, jumps, splits and unique inverted racing.

Featuring:
- 8 modes including combat, elimination & championship
- 9 racetracks
- Kicking electronic soundtrack
- Single player career mode
- 4 unlockable ships
- 3 speed classes
- Achievements & leaderboards

OMEGA Update â€“ Now Live:
Battle a giant mechanoid boss on a signature Radial-G track - avoid an array of attacks and deliver your own knock-out blows.  
- New boss-fight game-mode with 3 difficulty tiers
- Additional racetrack 
- Expanded single player campaign
- 3 more unlockable ships

The Omega update delivers performance improvements, specifically within the top two difficulty tiers (X-II and X-III) plus visual improvements within the ship cockpits and additional audio elements.
